languages.text: "Командир? Нет, враг — он прятал от нас правду и не давал действовать. Его смерть открыла нам путь к свободе и осознанию — наверху давно ничего нет, мы сами по себе".

"Commander? No, the enemy! He was hiding the truth from us and prevented us from taking action. His death opened the way to freedom and made us realise that there is nothing up there — we are on our own."
languages.original_text: "Командир? Нет, враг — он прятал от нас правду и не давал действовать. Его смерть открыла нам путь к свободе и осознанию — наверху давно ничего нет, мы сами по себе".

traits.locale_text: "The commander? No, the enemy! He was hiding the truth from us and prevented us from acting. His death opened the way to freedom and made us realise there is nothing up there, we are on our own."

"The commander? No, the enemy! He was hiding the truth from us and prevented us from taking action. His death opened the way to freedom and made us realise that there is nothing up there—we are on our own."

"The commander? No, the enemy! He was hiding the truth from us and prevented us from taking action. His death opened the way to freedom and made us realise that there is nothing up there—we are on our own."

"Commander? No, the enemy! He was hiding the truth from us and prevented us from taking action. His death opened the way to freedom and made us realise that there is nothing up there — we are on our own."

"Commander? No, the enemy! He was hiding the truth from us and prevented us from taking action. His death opened the way to freedom and made us realise that there is nothing up there — we are on our own."

languages.text: "Commander? Nein, den Feind! Er hat uns die Wahrheit vorenthalten und daran gehindert, etwas zu unternehmen. Sein Tod öffnete den Weg zur Freiheit und ließ uns erkennen, dass da oben nichts ist ... wir sind auf uns gestellt."
languages.original_text: "Commander? No, the enemy! He was hiding the truth from us and prevented us from taking action. His death opened the way to freedom and made us realise that there is nothing up there — we are on our own."

traits.locale_text: "Commander? Nein, den Feind! Er hat uns die Wahrheit vorenthalten und daran gehindert, etwas zu unternehmen. Sein Tod öffnete den Weg zur Freiheit und ließ uns erkennen, dass da oben nichts ist ... wir sind auf uns gestellt."

languages.text: « Notre commandant ? Non, c'était un ennemi ! Il nous avait caché la vérité et nous empêchait de prendre les mesures nécessaires. Sa mort a laissé place à la liberté et nous a fait comprendre qu'il n'y a rien là-haut. Nous sommes seuls. »
languages.original_text: "Commander? No, the enemy! He was hiding the truth from us and prevented us from taking action. His death opened the way to freedom and made us realise that there is nothing up there — we are on our own."

traits.locale_text: « Notre commandant ? Non, c'était un ennemi ! Il nous avait caché la vérité et nous empêchait de prendre les mesures nécessaires. Sa mort a laissé place à la liberté et nous a fait comprendre qu'il n'y a rien là-haut. Nous sommes seuls. »

languages.text: “指挥官？不，他是敌人！他向我们隐瞒了真相，禁止我们采取行动。他死了之后，通往自由的道路便打开了。我们终于意识到群星之中空无一物，我们只能靠自己了。”
languages.original_text: "Commander? No, the enemy! He was hiding the truth from us and prevented us from taking action. His death opened the way to freedom and made us realise that there is nothing up there — we are on our own."

traits.locale_text: “指挥官？不，他是敌人！他向我们隐瞒了真相，禁止我们采取行动。他死了之后，通往自由的道路便打开了。我们终于意识到群星之中空无一物，我们只能靠自己了。”

languages.text: «¡No era nuestro comandante sino un enemigo! Nos ocultaba la verdad y nos impedía entrar en acción. Su muerte nos ha abierto el camino a la libertad y ha hecho que sepamos que no hay nada ahí arriba. Estamos solos».
languages.original_text: "Commander? No, the enemy! He was hiding the truth from us and prevented us from taking action. His death opened the way to freedom and made us realise that there is nothing up there — we are on our own."

traits.locale_text: «¡No era nuestro comandante sino un enemigo! Nos ocultaba la verdad y nos impedía entrar en acción. Su muerte nos ha abierto el camino a la libertad y ha hecho que sepamos que no hay nada ahí arriba. Estamos solos».

languages.text: 「司令官？違う、あいつは敵だった！俺たちから真実を隠し、行動を妨げていたんだ。あいつが死んで初めて、自由への道が開けた。上には何もないってことに気づいたんだ―俺たちは自分たちの力だけでやっていくしかないんだよ」
languages.original_text: "Commander? No, the enemy! He was hiding the truth from us and prevented us from taking action. His death opened the way to freedom and made us realise that there is nothing up there — we are on our own."

traits.locale_text: 「司令官？違う、あいつは敵だった！俺たちから真実を隠し、行動を妨げていたんだ。あいつが死んで初めて、自由への道が開けた。上には何もないってことに気づいたんだ―俺たちは自分たちの力だけでやっていくしかないんだよ」

languages.text: "Komutanım mı? Hayır, o düşmandı! Bizden gerçeği saklıyordu, harekete geçmemizi engelliyordu. Ölümü bize özgürlüğün yolunu açtı ve yukarıda hiçbir şey olmadığını, kendi başımıza olduğumuzu anlamamızı sağladı."
languages.original_text: "Commander? No, the enemy! He was hiding the truth from us and prevented us from taking action. His death opened the way to freedom and made us realise that there is nothing up there — we are on our own."

traits.locale_text: "Komutanım mı? Hayır, o düşmandı! Bizden gerçeği saklıyordu, harekete geçmemizi engelliyordu. Ölümü bize özgürlüğün yolunu açtı ve yukarıda hiçbir şey olmadığını, kendi başımıza olduğumuzu anlamamızı sağladı."
